{{t.type}} {{t.amount}}
Back to Home import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from '../services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-transaction', templateUrl: './transaction.component.html', styleUrls: ['./transaction.component.css'] }) export class TransactionComponent { acno:any; transactions:any; constructor(private ds:DataService){ this.acno = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('currentAcno') || "" ); this.ds.getTransaction(this.acno).subscribe( (result:any) => { this.transactions = result.transaction; }, (result) => { alert(result.error.message) } ) } }
